entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections late this evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning except northwest 30 gusting to 50 near Bowen Island late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind light except northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
